content.prompt: Figure 1 shows the inheritance of a particular genetic condition in three generations of one family. Which of the following best explains the observed pattern of inheritance?

choices.label: The condition is passed randomly because of the independent assortment of chromosomes.
The condition is passed from fathers to sons via a Y-linked gene.
The condition is passed from mothers to sons via an X-linked gene.
The condition is passed from mothers to offspring via a mitochondrial gene.
